app-description: A skilled frontend developer proficient in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and modern UI frameworks. Showcasing expertise in state management, responsive design, and innovative web solutions for seamless user experiences.
not-found-msg: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. Please check the URL you entered or return to the home page.
header-details: I'm a frontend developer based in Egypt. I specialize in creating responsive and user-friendly websites using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, React and Next. I'm passionate about turning ideas into reality and always strive to deliver high-quality work.

projects.title: Latest Featured Projects
projects.description: Some of these projects were built entirely by me, while others were created as part of a team, where I contributed to key aspects of development.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I specialize in frontend development using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I also have experience with version control tools like Git and GitHub.

experience.title: I'm honored to work with
experience.description: Throughout my career, I've collaborated on diverse projects as both a professional developer and freelancer, continuously expanding my expertise in frontend development.

contact.title: Reach Me Out
contact.text: Want to contact me professionally or as a fellow developer?
contact.looking_for: I'm currently looking for more employment and freelance opportunities
